casebody.data:
SEJASMI INDUSTRIES, INC., Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellee,
v.
A+ MOLD, INC., d/b/a Takumi Manufacturing Company, Defendant/Cross-Defendant,
and
Quality Cavity, Inc., Defendant/Counterplaintiff/Cross-Plaintiff/Third-Party Plaintiff-Appellant,
and
NKL Manufacturing, Inc., Third-Party Defendant. SC: 156341
COA: 336205 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 20, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's December 21, 2018 order is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that reconsideration of our previous order is warranted. MCR 7.311(G).

Viviano, J., did not participate due to a familial relationship with the presiding circuit court judge in this case.
